reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Project ?Decarbonizing District Heating in Serbia? which will be implemented by CeSID( Centre for Free Elections and Democracy) include the following project activities: desk researches field surveys preparation design and printing of study ?Green Invest ment Oppurtunities in District Heating in Serbia? organization of the final project Conference as well as the preparation of three prefeasibility studies for two selected municipalities in Serbia- Zrenjanin and Pirot.Immediate objective of the project is preparation of nation-wide information base for prospects for energy efficiency and renewable energy sources deployment in district heating systems in Serbia and dissemination of the information to interested national and international parties.The informat ion gathered will be structured in a report ?Green investments in district heating systems in Serbia? in a way that enables that main messages are clearly sent. Final project conference aims to gather together problem ?owners? decision makers and possible investors from private and public sectors and to convey both main messages in justified manner. Conference will also represent a vehicle for knowledge transfer and dissemination of best practices from Finland possessing technology positive experience inter est to finance or any other interest in the green development of district heating sector in Serbia.The study ?Green Investment Opportunities in District Heating in Serbia?will utilize the results of the desk and field surveys build on past experience on Ce SIDassociates numerous past and future consultations and analyses in order to gather together existing scattered information and to convey main messages to all stakeholders primarily investors in district heating systems from both public and private sector from Serbia and abroad.
